import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faBed, faBinoculars, faCalendar, faCalendarDays, faCar, faPerson, faPlane, faTaxi, faTeletype } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import './header.css' import { DateRange } from 'react-date-range'; import 'react-date-range/dist/styles.css'; // main css file import 'react-date-range/dist/theme/default.css'; // theme css file import {format} from 'date-fns'; const Header = ({type}) => { const [dates, setDates] = useState([ { startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), key: 'selection' } ]); const [openDate, setOpenDate] = useState(false) const [openOptions, setOpenOptions] = useState(false) const [options, setOptions] = useState ({ adult: 1, children: 0, room: 1, }) const handleOption = (optionName, operation) => { setOptions(objToChange=> { return { ...objToChange, [optionName]: operation ==='i' ? options[optionName] + 1 : options[optionName] -1 }; }); }; return (
Stays

Car Rentals
Sigtseeings
Airport Taxi
{ type !=='list' && <>

A lifetime of discounts

Get rewarded for your travels - unlock instant savings for 10% or more with a free Lamabooking account

setOpenDate(!openDate)} className='headerSearchText'>{`${format(dates[0].startDate, "MM/dd/yyyy")} to ${format(dates[0].endDate, "MM/dd/yyyy")}`} { openDate && setDates([item.selection])} moveRangeOnFirstSelection={false} ranges={dates} className='date' />}
setOpenOptions(!openOptions)} className='headerSearchText'>{`${options.adult} adult 路 ${options.children} children 路 ${options.room} room`} {openOptions &&
Adult
{options.adult}
Children
{options.children}
Room
{options.room}
}
}
); } export default Header
